scenario: Bob received the following amounts during the year: Dividends: $23,492.72, Gift from Parents: $48,627.71, Wages: $34,940.57, Life Insurance Proceeds (Death): $37,872.80, Gambling Winnings: $3,461.70.
question: Calculate Bob's gross income under I.R.C. § 61.
answer_explanation: Gross income includes all income from whatever source derived, unless excluded. Total: $61,894.99.
reasoning: Summed included items, ignored excluded items.
